verses.verse: A Secret Treasure of David. Watch over me, O God, for I take refuge in You.
Oh my soul you have said to Jehovah, You are my Lord; My goodness is not apart from You.
As for the holy ones in the earth, they are the great ones; all my delight is in them.
Their sorrows shall multiply if they run after another god. I will not pour out their drink offering of blood; and I will not take their names on my lips.
Jehovah is the portion of My lot and of my cup; You shall uphold My lot.
The lines have fallen to Me in pleasant places; yea, a beautiful inheritance is to Me.
I will bless Jehovah, who counseled Me. My reins also teach Me in the nights.
I have set Jehovah always before Me; for He is at My right hand: I shall not be shaken.
So My heart is glad, and My glory rejoices; My flesh shall also rest in hope;
For You will not leave My soul in Sheol; You will not give Your Holy One to see corruption.
You will make Me know the way of life. In Your presence is fullness of joys; at Your right hand are pleasures forever.
